title: A Great conspiracy by the papists in the kingdome of Ireland discovered by the lords, justices and counsell at Dvblin and proclaimed there Octob. 23, 1641 : vvhich proclamation was sent to the Parliament here in England, and read before the Lords and Commons in Parliament on Munday Novemb. 1, 1641 : vvhereunto is annexed the copy of a letter written with the kings owne hand, and sent to Mr. Nicholas, Clarke of the counsell from Edenbvrgh Octob. 18, 1641.
author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
